00012     ORTrig4ChanDecoder() {}
00013     virtual ~ORTrig4ChanDecoder() {}
00014 
00015     virtual inline UInt_t trigOf(UInt_t* record)
00016       { return (record[1] & 0x07000000) >> 24; }
00017     virtual inline UInt_t UpClockOf(UInt_t* record)
00018       { return (record[1] & 0x00ffffff);}
00019     virtual inline UInt_t LowClockOf(UInt_t* record)
00020       { return (record[2] & 0xffffffff); }
00021    virtual inline ULong64_t ClockOf(UInt_t* record)
00022    { return ( (ULong64_t) UpClockOf( record ) << 32 ) + 
00023    (ULong64_t) LowClockOf( record ); }
00024
